moves.1... f5: ... and the deviation. No P-K4 for T.M. today!

moves.4. Qh5+: I was going to capture the KNP en passant, when I looked again and found this! I didn't know the quote at the time, but I was following Fischer's rule: "You have found a good move. Look again! There probably exists a better one."
